title: Exxon, Chevron Clock Best Month Since 2022 as Crude Surges
description: Shares of US oil giants Exxon Mobil Corp. and Chevron Corp. notched their largest monthly gains in more than three years, boosted by rising energy prices, geopolitical tensions and improving fundamentals.
content: Shares of US oil giants Exxon Mobil Corp. and Chevron Corp. notched their largest monthly gains in more than three years, boosted by rising energy prices, geopolitical tensions and improving fundamentals.
